data.title: Music on Main
data.meta_description: Located in the heart of downtown on Morgan Square, Music on Main is Spartanburg's most anticipated summer concert series! Friends from all over gather every Thursday, April to July, from 5:30 to 8:30 pm to listen to some of the hottest and hippest bands around!
data.text:
When: Thursdays, April to July

Where: Morgan Square in Downtown Spartanburg at 100 W Main Street, Spartanburg, SC.

Get ready for a-rockin' good time!

Located in the heart of downtown on Morgan Square, Music on Main is Spartanburg's most anticipated summer concert series! Friends from all over gather every Thursday, April to July, from 5:30 to 8:30 pm to listen to some of the hottest and hippest bands around!

Music on Main Gives Back

Not only does Music on Main provide entertainment for the local community, it also serves as an excellent fundraising opportunity for Spartanburg's civic organizations. Club members serve as volunteers at each Music on Main concert and then receive a percentage of sales to support their charities. Since MOM's inception over $250,000 has been donated to local civic organizations. Some of the groups who volunteer at Music on Main each year include Knights of Columbus, Spartanburg Jaycees, Westview Ruritans, Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity, Spartanburg Optimist Club, Divine 9, Sunrise Civitans, and others.

2024 Sponsors
